-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c1, c1), c2))

comment: If two intersecting sets ` A ` and ` B ` are both small in ` V ` , their union is small in ` ( V ^ 2 ) ` . Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.12. This proposition actually does not require any axiom of the definition of uniform structures. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)
